name: Mad Cop 4: Hummer 4x4 Street Racing
description:
It’s Hummer Time! We bring you the next installment of the Mad Cop series with better graphics, improved game play, and optimized for the latest Apple devices.

Mad Cop 4 sets the new standard in 4x4 racing games.

MC4 puts you in control of the biggest, baddest police vehicle on the road : The 4x4 Hummer. The game takes you through a series of driving skills test before you get the chance to go after the bad guys.

REAL CARS
We used ultra realistic 3D models in this game. Hummers and other sports cars are used during the game. Cops driving 4x4 chasing bad guys in Sports cars. Does it get any more awesome than that?

REALISTIC EXPLOSIONS AND OBSTACLES
Boom goes the dynamite! We spared no expense to create the most realistic explosions possible. We use cones, ramps, barrels, and other barriers to keep the game as realistic as possible.

REAL SCENERY
Realistic looking 3D landscapes with trees, buildings, walls, and fences. Yes, even the fences look real. Simply amazing.

REALISTIC MISSIONS
Complete the mission to advance to the next level. 6 Different levels. One Bonus level that is a free for all level.

MULTIPLE VIEWS
Choose to either be right behind the wheel, from the left or from the right. This helps add a more realistic element to the game.

What other players are saying about Mad Cop 4:

“Looking forward to the latest installment of this fun game” -- Jarred from Michigan.

“Loving my MC4. Can’t wait until they add even more levels.” - Jim L. Columbus

“YOLO! I mean, why can’t my girl get a star on the walk of fame? I love this game” -- K. West

Hummer don’t play that! Thanks for reading this far . . .now download the free game and give it a try!
